name: The Witches Pond
description:
The Witches Pond is a horror-adventure game based on a small story from the real place "The Witches Pond" based in Bucharest, Romania.

You play as a Journalist who investigates so-called paranormal places to reveal the truth that they are fake. Everything goes wrong this time when he meets them, and goes through some events that may or may not seem real...

Explore a world of strange, dangerous, and unsettling places. Things will happen to you that play with your mind, you are just a simple prey in their game.



PLAYSTYLE


Linear gameplay is where the player adventures in the unknown and experiences some events.

Features


Story-focused exploration - Explore the dark places that you thought were fictional and face the harsh reality.
Psychedelic horror - Confusing and dream-like World.
